description: A sanctioned entity is a record of a person or company that has been barred or prohibited from some activity, e.g. disqualified from being a director, banned from bidding for contracts, or is on a sanctions list

category.description: Category of sanction. This field is required (other options may be added in the future). A listed_sanctioned_entity is an entity that is on a national or international sanctions list, e.g. OFAC

uid.description: Unique id/reference for the sanctioned entity record if the sanctioning body has given it one

title.description: The title of the sanction entity record, if given

url.description: Persistent URL for the sanctioned entity record, if there is one

source_url.description: Source url of the web page for the filing or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page). This field is required.

start_date.description: Date on which the sanction started

end_date.description: Date on which the sanction ended, or is scheduled to end

retrieved_at.description: Date-time this was retrieved from the source

sample_date.description: Date on which we know this to be true (for example the date the sanction list was published)

other_attributes.description: Use for other attributes for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes

sanctions_list.title: Sanctions List
sanctions_list.description: The sanctions list from which this entry is taken

publisher.description: The publisher/maintainer of the sanctions list

jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction covered by the register

title.description: The title of the sanctions list

url.description: The URL of the sanctions list
